DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Collection Genotype-Tissue Expression Program Start Intervention or Procedure Date/Time
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The calendar date and time on which the GTEx procedure started.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biospecimen Collection Genotype-Tissue Expression Program Start Intervention or Procedure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The act or process of gathering biospecimens for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes._A program sponsored by the National Institutes of Health's Common Fund, designed to provide insights into the mechanisms of gene regulation by studying human gene expression and regulation in multiple tissues from healthy individuals, exploring disease-related perturbations in a variety of human diseases, and examining sexual dimorphisms in gene expression and regulation in multiple tissues. Genetic variation between individuals will be examined for correlation with differences in gene expression level to identify regions of the genome that influence whether and how much a gene is expressed._Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins._An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The act or process of gathering biospecimens for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes.

Concepts.definition: The act or process of gathering biospecimens for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes.

Property.preferredName: Genotype-Tissue Expression Program Begin Intervention or Procedure
Property.preferredDefinition: A program sponsored by the National Institutes of Health's Common Fund, designed to provide insights into the mechanisms of gene regulation by studying human gene expression and regulation in multiple tissues from healthy individuals, exploring disease-related perturbations in a variety of human diseases, and examining sexual dimorphisms in gene expression and regulation in multiple tissues. Genetic variation between individuals will be examined for correlation with differences in gene expression level to identify regions of the genome that influence whether and how much a gene is expressed.:Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.:An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

Concepts.definition: A program sponsored by the National Institutes of Health's Common Fund, designed to provide insights into the mechanisms of gene regulation by studying human gene expression and regulation in multiple tissues from healthy individuals, exploring disease-related perturbations in a variety of human diseases, and examining sexual dimorphisms in gene expression and regulation in multiple tissues. Genetic variation between individuals will be examined for correlation with differences in gene expression level to identify regions of the genome that influence whether and how much a gene is expressed.
Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.

An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happened. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Display format: MM/DD/YYYY HR:MN; Use NCIt based Rep Class
